page.title: 01CULLOMPTON INTRODUCTION
page.content: Focal point of our area is Cullompton(pop.c.4,500,81 census) mentioned in the{Domesday Book.}It developed above the flood plain of{ the{River Culm,}the river forming a natural route between high ground.It is a centre for surrounding villages and farms. Police,fire services,court, schools,library,health centre,sports hall,are all found here.A large supermarket has opened and on the main street are family businesses and inns,including an old posting inn. Town life has been much altered by construction of{M.5.}motorway.Tourist traffic now bypasses town.Access to motorway should attract new housing and hopefully new industry as many old factories have now closed. Thriving farms surround{Cullompton.}
